ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
EmCare.B22.DE24Able to finish RUTFThe client was able to finish the RUTF (the client was able to finish the minimum amount of RTUF (at least one-third of a packet of RUTF portion (92g) or 3 teaspoons from a pot within 30 minutes)
EmCare.B22.DE25Unable to finish RUTFThe client was unable to finish the RUTF (the client was unable to eat one-third of a packet of RUTF portion (92g) or 3 teaspoons from a pot within 30 minutes)
EmCare.B22.DE26RUTF Not AvailableThe healthcare worker did not have any RUTF available to carry out the appetite test

value.value: The client was able to finish the RUTF (the client was able to finish the minimum amount of RTUF (at least one-third of a packet of RUTF portion (92g) or 3 teaspoons from a pot within 30 minutes)
The client was unable to finish the RUTF (the client was unable to eat one-third of a packet of RUTF portion (92g) or 3 teaspoons from a pot within 30 minutes)
The healthcare worker did not have any RUTF available to carry out the appetite test
